title: Mathematics Learning Material Design Utilizing Embedded Support Tools in Remote Education Environments

context.prior_knowledge: College-Level Mathematics Foundations and Job-Related Applied Experience
context.additional_context: A non-degree advanced mathematics course for working professionals, with a flexible learning environment using personal devices

learning_goals: Learners will be able to explain mathematical problem-solving processes with 80% or higher accuracy using digital learning materials embedded with Embedded Support Devices (ESDs).
Learners successfully analyze case studies presented in ESD-based materials at least three times using prior knowledge (practical calculus, linear algebra).
Learners reduce individual learning gaps by at least 50% within two weeks through assessment tools embedded with a feedback system.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
